articles.title: Epstein files fallout takes down elite figures in Europe, while U.S. reckoning is muted - NPR
articles.description: Unlike in Europe, officials in the U.S. with ties to Epstein have largely held their positions of power.
articles.content:
The contrast is striking: In Europe, some people whose names come up in the Epstein files are facing consequences but in the U.S., not so much.
European royals, government officials, politicians and… [+5724 chars]

articles.author: Gregory Svirnovskiy
articles.title: Newsom says Trump’s attacks are bringing Europe together - Politico
articles.description: It’s the president’s one contribution to the continent, the California governor said.
articles.content: Newsoms jab at the president came as Munich attendees digested a Saturday speech from Secretary of State Marco Rubio, which took a measured tone toward the strained transatlantic relationship and cal… [+1846 chars]
